doc.name: GPInputHandler
doc.description:
A class for GPIO pins on the Luminary board.

This actor will have no effect in model simulations, but allows for code generators to generate the actors.
doc.author: Jia Zou, Jeff C. Jensen
doc.property: Which pin (0-7) of GPIO to use. FIXME: Verify user has set value between 0 and 7.
Which pad (A-G) of GPIO to use. FIXME: Verify user has set value between A and H.
